thread.title: Too early to draw conclusions on doping in curling: Russian sport minister

title: Too early to draw conclusions on doping in curling: Russian sport minister
text:
Too early to draw conclusions on doping in curling: Russian sport minister 5:03pm GMT - 01:01 
Russian Sport Minister Pavel Kolobkov says it's too early to draw conclusions on the doping case involving Olympic curler Alexander Krushelnitsky. Rough cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Russian Sport Minister Pavel Kolobkov says it's too early to draw conclusions on the doping case involving Olympic curler Alexander Krushelnitsky. Rough cut (no reporter narration).
